items.summary: Update the School Profile banner component (`frontend/src/components/school/SchoolProfileBanner.tsx`) so it can display a carousel/slider of multiple photos (visually and interactively similar to the existing directory School Card media carousel), while preserving the existing overlay readability treatment, school name + location, and optional “Inquire Now” button behavior.

Wire the School Detail page (`frontend/src/pages/SchoolDetailPage.tsx`) to pass a list of curated gallery images (when available via `getCuratedGalleryImages(school.id)`) into the School Profile banner so the banner carousel uses the same curated media as the School Card, with a sensible fallback to the existing default banner image when curated images are not present.
Keep user-facing text in English for any new accessibility labels or fallback messaging introduced by the School Profile banner carousel.
